channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- waterline-sequel node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- waterline-sequel node module

item.title: CVE-2016-10551|2024-08-06T03:21:52.163Z -- hackerone -- waterline-sequel%20node%20module
item.description: waterline-sequel is a module that helps generate SQL statements for Waterline apps Any user input that goes into Waterline's `like`, `contains`, `startsWith`, or `endsWith` will end up in waterline-sequel with the potential for malicious code. A malicious user can input their own SQL statements in waterline-sequel 0.50 that will get executed and have full access to the database.
